title: I'm not receiving any more email lately.
content: 1. Recently, I'm not receiving any more new emails on this computer. What is causing this? Please help me solve this problem. 2. I just received a notification that Mozilla will shut down Pocket's services on July 8, 2025. I'm not sure that I utilize this service. Thank you and I look forward to hearing from you. Best regards, Sheila Herman
creator: swherman

title: trying to add login, email, imap and pop but getting login failed - need help - was working broke now
content:
Spectrum said call Mozilla for support. They said call Mozilla.

Thunderbird on my old pc was working fine for a month. Had Microsoft on the line and they deleted my email account and added it again and Thunderbird can no longer connect to spectrum mail service. I tried to fix it and had it working going out(sending) but not receiving for a couple of hours but then started over and broke it permanently with login error from server and could not fix it after I screwed it up. So here I am.

Also, have new second pc and just loaded thunderbird and it gets same login problem. Also had Microsoft look at my new pc which has classic office home 2024 and m365 office 2024 but they could not get either one of them to work connecting to spectrum and get same login error. MS tried used my old pc because it was actually working and they added same setup there and they could not get it working.

Gmail works fine on all these programs mentioned above. Just talking to spectrum gets failed logon error which configuration, email name or password are wrong.

I am doing something wrong and cannot find the problem.

Can you help?
creator: fliuzzi1

title: Current laptop version of Mozilla Thunderbird

title: Incoming emails
content: New incoming emails are no longer marked as "unread" and In bold print when they arrive. I have to manually mark them as unread. Then when I read them, they do not consistently change to "read". This was not a problem until I started using the 128.10.0esr (64-bit) version of Thunderbird.
creator: gene51

title: Messages deleted/missing after compacting
content:
Several days ago, I asked for an explanation of any process that would retrieve the emails I lost (completely missing) after the compacting process. Your information indicates that compacting would not cause any data loss. That has not been the case.

To date, I further haven't received any response regarding how I might retrieve those emails.

Many of these emails are quite important to my business - and I entrusted your software to preserve those. Again - no response regarding how I might retrieve them.

Please respond ASAP - I am at critical juncture here, and need a resolution forthwith.

Thank you. John Van Epps johnvanepps0312@gmail.com
creator: johnvanepps0312
